definition[0]: (1925â€“2008) a US film actor and director, known for being very good-looking and sexually attractive, with very blue eyes. His films included Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid (1969) and The Sting (1973). He won an Oscar for The Color of Money (1986). He was also known for his interest in motor racing, and for starting a company that makes good quality food.
